## SliderProps interface

Props of [Slider](./react-native-material-kit.slider.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SliderProps extends ViewProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [lowerTrackColor](./react-native-material-kit.sliderprops.lowertrackcolor.md) | <code>any</code> | Color of the lower part of the track, it's also the color of the thumb |
|  [max](./react-native-material-kit.sliderprops.max.md) | <code>number</code> | Maximum value of the range, default is <code>100</code>. |
|  [min](./react-native-material-kit.sliderprops.min.md) | <code>number</code> | Minimum value of the range, default is <code>0</code>. |
|  [onChange](./react-native-material-kit.sliderprops.onchange.md) | <code>(value: number) =&gt; void</code> | Callback when value changed |
|  [onConfirm](./react-native-material-kit.sliderprops.onconfirm.md) | <code>(value: number) =&gt; void</code> | Callback when the value is confirmed |
|  [onPressIn](./react-native-material-kit.sliderprops.onpressin.md) | <code>() =&gt; void</code> | Callback when slider is pressed anywhere |
|  [onPressOut](./react-native-material-kit.sliderprops.onpressout.md) | <code>() =&gt; void</code> | Callback when slider stops being pressed |
|  [step](./react-native-material-kit.sliderprops.step.md) | <code>number</code> | Step value of the Slider, must be a divisor of max |
|  [thumbPadding](./react-native-material-kit.sliderprops.thumbpadding.md) | <code>number</code> | Padding for the hitSlop on the Slider thumb |
|  [thumbRadius](./react-native-material-kit.sliderprops.thumbradius.md) | <code>number</code> | Radius of the thumb of the Slider |
|  [trackSize](./react-native-material-kit.sliderprops.tracksize.md) | <code>number</code> | The thickness of the Slider track |
|  [upperTrackColor](./react-native-material-kit.sliderprops.uppertrackcolor.md) | <code>any</code> | Color of the upper part of the track |
|  [value](./react-native-material-kit.sliderprops.value.md) | <code>number</code> | Current value |
